solution_line_template: Twice the speed of the bald eagle is {bald_eagle_speed}*{multiplier}=<<{bald_eagle_speed}*{multiplier}={peregrine_falcon_speed}>>{peregrine_falcon_speed} miles per hour.
Thus, based on the ratio of their speeds, the following expression is given: x={bald_eagle_time}*({bald_eagle_speed}/{peregrine_falcon_speed}).
